price: 7. Usun yeemene maral baahaanamal gaabowwu iyyeenih assalaalaquk sugcn.
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
